message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. This is a great deal considering the value it brings. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $10000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $12500 to try and make this work.  This is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but $11000 is still too low for me. I'm willing to compromise again and offer you the product for $11500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product and the fact that I'm willing to negotiate with you. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go to $11500. How about we meet in the middle at $11250?

Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about $11375? This is a very fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's close this deal.  I'm not sure how much longer I can hold out on selling to John.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short of my target. How about we meet at $11000? I'm willing to make a serious commitment if we can meet at this price.
